verses.roman:
tabe kata dine kaila pada-caṅkramaṇa
śiśu-gaṇe mili' kaila vividha khelana

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; kata dine—in a few days; kaila—did; pada—legs; caṅkramaṇa—movement; śiśu-gaṇe—all the children; mili'-mingling together; kaila—executed; vividha—varieties; khelana—sporting.
translation: After some days the Lord began to move His legs and walk. He mixed with other children and exhibited various sports.
